          <title>
            <string language="es">Reproducción bacteriana</string>
            <string language="en">Bacterial reproduction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterielle Wiedergabe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reproduction bactérienne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reprodução bacteriana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riproduzione batterica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βακτηριακή αναπαραγωγή</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Explica la reproducción por bipartición y los modos de reproducción parasexual, por conjugación, por transducción y por transformación.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic explaining reproduction through binary fission and parasexual modes of reproduction through conjugation, and transformation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reproducción bacteriana</string>
            <string language="en">Bacterial reproduction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das Wiedergabe durch binäre Spaltung und 
parasexual Modi der Wiedergabe durch Konjugation erklären, und 
Transformation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet expliquant la reproduction par la fission 
binaire et les modes parasexual de la reproduction par la conjugaison,
et transformation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que explicam a reprodução com o fission
binário e modalidades parasexual da reprodução com o conjugation, e
transformação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che spiegano riproduzione con la 
fissione binaria ed i modi parasexual della riproduzione con la 
coniugazione e trasformazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξηγεί την αναπαραγωγή μέσω της διχοτόμησης 
και των παραφυλετικών τρόπων αναπαραγωγής μέσω της κλίσης, και 
του μετασχηματισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bakterielle Wiedergabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
